comments: I was told that she was one of the toughest professors for this course but the best nonetheless. That was the truth - a great professor, teaches you a lot, but you have to work for your grade. Not recommended if you want to sail through but if you actually want to learn something she\'s your gal.
This class was probably one of the most useful classes I\'ve taken so far. Everyone should take it. Don\'t like how hard of a grader she is but still a great teacher.
Her classes are very useful. Learned a lot! She\'s a great prof. Funny, interesting, nice, fair grader albeit a tough one, and just all around awesome.
